LanguageData.RF_Gun_Tecnine.label: TEC-9
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Tecnine.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pistol with a quick draw, low damage and very high firerate. Operates at a short range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Tecnine.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Tecnine.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Tecnine.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_GreaseGun.label: M3A1 Greasegun
LanguageData.RF_Gun_GreaseGun.description: A very simplistic submachinegun design for todays standards. Low damage, high firerate, short range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_GreaseGun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_GreaseGun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_GreaseGun.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.label: Uzi
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.description: A basic submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MachinePistol.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_TMP.label: Silenced TMP
LanguageData.RF_Gun_TMP.description: A big machinepistol or small submachinegun. Somewhat accurate long range, fast burstfire with low stopping power.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_TMP.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_TMP.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_TMP.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Skorpion.label: HK MP5K
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Skorpion.description: A light SMG with no stock. Fires weak ammunition in quick five shot-bursts at pistol range.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Skorpion.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Skorpion.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Skorpion.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Vector.label: Kriss Vector SMG
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Vector.description: A submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximal range by a lot.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Vector.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Vector.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Vector.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_MP5Gun.label: HK MP5A3
LanguageData.Gun_MP5Gun.description: The Heckler Koch MP5 is a 9mm submachine gun of German design, developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler Koch GmbH of Oberndorf am Neckar. Low damage and short range, very high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_MP5Gun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MP5Gun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_MP5Gun.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_UMP45Gun.label: HK UMP45
LanguageData.Gun_UMP45Gun.description: The UMP45 is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler Koch. The UMP45 has been adopted by various agencies such as the U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Heckler Koch developed the UMP45 as a successor to the MP5. Average damage, low range and high rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_UMP45Gun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_UMP45Gun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_UMP45Gun.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.label: Spectre M4
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.description: A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_HeavySMG.tools.2.label: muzzle
